bpi.most.server.model

Class Zone

  • java.lang.Object
    • bpi.most.server.model.Zone

  • public class Zone
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO of a zone used for grouping datapoints. Currently, independent zone grouping is implemented using the MOST-DB. Therefore, a Datapoint can only be linked to ONE zone. Zones can contain any number of subzones. TODO: implement zone DAO for an IFC file. Handle IfcZone, IfcSpatialZone, IfcSpace, etc. as zone. Use GlobalId as identifier.
    Author:
    robert.zach@tuwien.ac.at

      • getEntity

        public ZoneEntity getEntity()

      • getSubzones

        public java.util.List<Zone> getSubzones(int sublevels)
        TODO: prevent loops, done in the db? Returns subzones which are contained in a given number of sublevels of a zone
        Parameters:
        sublevels - level of returned sublevels sublevels = 0 --> 0 subzones --> empty result sublevels = 1 --> return "next level" of subzones sublevels = 2 --> return "two levels" of subzones ... sublevels = null --> return "all level" of subzones
        Returns:
        List of subzones.

      • addSubzone

        public boolean addSubzone(Zone subzone)
        not implemented yet Links a zone as a subzone of this zone
        Parameters:
        subzone - which should be linked to this zone
        Returns:

      • getDatapoints

        public java.util.List<Datapoint> getDatapoints(int sublevel)
        Returns Datapoints which are contained in a given number of sublevels of a zone
        Parameters:
        sublevels - level of returned datapoints sublevels = 0 --> return datapoints of this zone sublevels = 1 --> return datapoints of this and "next level" zone ... sublevels = null --> return datapoints of this and all subzones
        Returns:
        List of Datapoint that are in the zone/subzones

      • getDatapoints

        public java.util.List<Datapoint> getDatapoints(int sublevel,
                                      java.lang.String dpType)
        not implemented yet
        Returns:
        List of Datapoint with the requested type that are in the zone or subzone
